Classes in battlesys used by battlesys
BattleRecord
          Recording the complete course of battle and draw, save and upload the line graph
CompleteMoveResult
          A complete move result, consists of list of individual move results and a result string.
Move
          Generic move class - The root of the Move Hirerachy.
MoveNormal
          Class for normal move - moves that do direct attacks Damage way can be modified through changing the parameters
Player
          Class for storing general data and moves for a player TODO implements Serializable...
Player.statusId
          Id for uniquely identifying all the statuses, used to tell whether a player has a certain status inflicted, etc...
PlayerBattleRecord
          Records how a player plays the battles, that is, number of wins, loses, draws, etc...
PlayerList
          A List of Players, with numerous more functions specific for a list of players
RandomEventResult
          Immutable class stores a result of the random event phase
SingleBattleResult
          Class storing the result of a single battle
SingleMoveResult
          Records results of a move.
